ComicInfo.Summary: Death Pool #1: Sara and Jake investigate the brutal murder of a man and his psychotic wife. When they visit the wife's former shrink, he panics and bolts, leading them right into the arms of Sara's old foe, Shine. The police catch up with Ian.
